alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 7:52AM AKST until January 31 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occurring. Plan difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch are expected. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph are causing blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Conditions will improve slowly this afternoon as winds gradually decrease. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.
